overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This is an overview of all wish lists. Here you can find information/links and let everyone know you bought an item!

wishList.title: My wish list
wishList.description: This is your own wish list. You can add, remove or edit items.

ideas.title: Ideas
ideas.description: This is an overview where you can track all your ideas for gifts. If you tick something off in the overview page, it will also automatically be added here!
